profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes 'MLOps Engineer' and focuses heavily on the operational aspects of machine learning models, including deployment, maintenance, retraining, monitoring, and CI/CD pipelines. While GenAI models are mentioned, the core responsibilities and the title itself point towards a strong foundation in traditional ML operations and productionizing models, aligning more closely with the 'ML Engineer' profile's emphasis on MLOps and productionizing prototypes.

job_tasks.justification: The job title is 'Senior Machine Learning Ops Engineer' and responsibilities include 'Maintain ML models in production (i.e. retraining, monitoring health and ensuring service availability)', 'CI/CD Implementation & Orchestration', and 'Responsible for batch, real-time and GenAI model deployments'.
The role involves implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines and streamlining deployment workflows.
The role explicitly states responsibility for deploying various types of models, including GenAI.
job_tasks.phrase: Responsible for batch, real-time and GenAI model deployments

job_tasks.justification: Key responsibilities include maintaining models in production, which involves retraining and monitoring.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintenance: Maintain ML models in production (i.e. retraining, monitoring health and ensuring service availability)

job_tasks.justification: The role involves creating reusable deployment templates for ML models, which requires software development skills for templating and potentially scripting.
job_tasks.phrase: Templates: Create and manage reusable deployment templates for ML models

job_tasks.justification: The role requires translating technical needs of the Data science team into templates and aligning the tech stack with architectural requirements, indicating a need to understand business and technical contexts.
job_tasks.phrase: translate the technical needs of the Data science team to appropriate templates that fit within our generalized Model Factory platform

job_tasks.justification: The role involves collaborating with Solution architects and IT teams on security concerns and tech stack alignment, requiring an understanding of broader IT and business requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: IT Security & Compliance: Implement security concerns related to ML systems with the Solution architect and IT teams

job_tasks.justification: The role requires providing support in aligning the tech stack with architectural requirements, indicating a need to understand system architecture and its relation to business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Tech Stack Alignment: Provide support in aligning the tech stack with architectural requirements in collaboration with Solution architects and IT4IT engineers.

job_tasks.justification: While the primary focus is MLOps, the role supports deployments of 'AI Models (MARS, Gen AI & New use cases)' and involves retraining, which are aspects of model lifecycle management.
job_tasks.phrase: AI Models (MARS, Gen AI & New use cases)

job_tasks.justification: The role involves supporting data scientists during model deployment, a key MLOps activity.
job_tasks.phrase: Support Deployments: Collaborate with data scientists during model deployment

soft_skills.phrase: working with the Model Factory team (platform team) as well as the Data science team
translate the technical needs of the Data science team
consult the Model Factory team on best practices
Implement security concerns related to ML systems with the Solution architect and IT teams
Collaborate with data scientists during model deployment
in collaboration with Solution architects and IT4IT engineers
best practices when it comes to MLOps and its implementation
Create and manage reusable deployment templates
